message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,150,000.  I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $1,050,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $1,050,000 is significantly below my bottom line.  I could part with it for $1,125,000. This offer still leaves you with a substantial profit margin.

Thank you for your response, Alice. I understand your position, but unfortunately, I am unable to meet your price of $1,125,000. I would like to continue the negotiation at $1,075,000. I hope this proposal is more in line with what we can agree upon.
